name: @cstack/conscious-monitor
description: ConsciousMonitor - Behavioral tracking application for macOS

scripts.dev: echo 'ConsciousMonitor is a macOS app. Open ConsciousMonitor.xcodeproj in Xcode to run in development mode.'
scripts.build:unsigned: xcodebuild -project ConsciousMonitor.xcodeproj -scheme ConsciousMonitor -configuration Release -derivedDataPath build CODE_SIGNING_ALLOWED=NO CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO
scripts.test:unsigned: xcodebuild -project ConsciousMonitor.xcodeproj -scheme ConsciousMonitor -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath build CODE_SIGNING_ALLOWED=NO CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO test
scripts.lint: echo 'Swift linting not configured. Use SwiftLint if needed.'
